resume_snippet: Derek Ren, B.S.E.  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Mr. Ren has over ten (10) years of experience in the Pharmaceutical/Biotech industry. He specializes in cGMP, Project Management, Engineering, Commissioning, Qualification, and Validation (CQV) of process equipment, facilities, and utilities.   In addition, he possesses great familiarity with capital delivery phases (Project Initiation, Conceptual Design, Basic/Detailed Design, Construction & Commissioning, Close-out).
